{{Quote|[[Isildur]] and an old [[Berek|friend]] reunite. [[Arondir]] grapples with change. [[Tar-Míriel|Míriel]] faces rising [[King's Men|opposition]]. [[Annatar]] counsels [[Celebrimbor]].|Official Synopsis, [[Amazon Studios]]}}

'''The Eagle and the Sceptre''' is the eleventh episode of [[Amazon Studios]]'s television series, ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]''. It is the third episode of the second season and it was released on [[29 August]], [[2024]].
